answers.answer: Do you feel like your goi g to get sick? Dose the light bug your eyes? Do you see little white dots? Are tou weating sunglasses in the house? Feel very light headed?  I got all those symptoms with my first and had pre eclamsea.
I have terrible heartburn and a cough when I first lie down but other than that I don't feel sick.The light doesn't hurt my eyes. Sometimes I see the little white dots but not all the time.
I would definitely mention it to your Dr!
With the swelling ontop seeing white dots sounds to me cause of concern, I don't mean to get you worried but I would mention it to your Dr just to be on safe side.
I see my doctor tomorrow so I'll speak to them then. Thanks for replying,
Yea mention to your dr they can help you for sure. That way you and bby aren't in harms way. I hope you start feeling better soon. Its better to know before to late.. hugs

My baby has given me high blood pressure which I now take medicine for since about 28 weeks I'm now 33 weeks tomorrow at last weeks appointment my urine was a +3 and my uric acid level a 4.8... Not good and signs of preeclampsia. I now have to go to the doctor once a week and go have baby monitored in between appointments... Other then really bad swelling in my feet and lower legs I have no other symptoms if your worried I would tell your doctor

question: How swollen do your hands have to be to begin to worry? Mine havnt been swollen my whole pregnancy and now they are my fingers are about 1/2 x's bigger than normal where I can't get my wedding rings on past my knuckles. I'm 36 weeks
title: Pre eclampsia swelling
